name: Save Your Life
description:
Make your way through a room filled of monsters. Don't trust the floor, it's a little bit ...

Avoid lava, collect gem, open chest, kill monster and go to next floor.

[game status]

- SYL is a prototype, many things to do!

- next steps : add gamepad support, add rapsberry support, add time stress, give more life to monster, and many more

[how-to]

- arrows key to move

- double tap arrows key to jump

- space or return is action key
